entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers this evening and then to 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers after midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
